title: Mobile-Supported Vocational English Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized MALL environment for working professionals, designed to systematically acquire workplace-ready English skills through self-directed learning and collaborative projects using personal mobile devices

learning_goals: Achieve intermediate-level English communication skills in job-related contexts (meetings, email writing, report analysis, etc.)
Develop self-directed learning habits using mobile learning platforms and secure ≥10 hours/week of voluntary study time
Demonstrate practical English presentation and collaborative document writing skills through PBL-based team projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
